availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Henry Holt (Affiant in Powell Circuit Court case in 1863)

body.p: Kentucky native. Affiant in Powell Circuit Court case in 1863. Signatory of a letter from Mount Sterling, Kentucky, in 1865.

ab.bibl: Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Montgomery County, Mt. Sterling, p. 3; Kentucky Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates (1911-1955), 1919, Oldham County, Kentucky, file no. 11914; KYR-0001-029-0545; KYR-0001-004-0463.
